title: Cynthia Erivo Acts in a New Dracula Play
summary: Cynthia Erivo is a famous actress who stars in a new play called Dracula in London. She plays many different characters all by herself, using her voice and movements to tell the story. Some people online said she was still learning her lines during early shows, but Cynthia ignores these comments. She focuses on doing her best on stage. The play uses cameras to show her face on a big screen, making it exciting to watch. Cynthia loves challenges and wants to grow as an artist. She has won many awards for her acting and singing.
